title: Sell Tears of Llorona
metaTitle: Sell Tears of Llorona Extra Añejo Tequila | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Tears of Llorona Extra Añejo. We buy this small-batch masterpiece by German Gonzalez. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy Tears of Llorona Extra Añejo.
introParagraph: Tears of Llorona is widely considered one of the finest Extra Añejo tequilas ever made. Crafted by Master Distiller German Gonzalez, it is aged in scotch, brandy, and sherry oak barrels. We purchase this allocation-only tequila directly from collectors. If you have a bottle of Tears, getting an offer is simple.
whatWeBuy: Tears of Llorona Extra Añejo No. 3
pricingFactors: Batch number (early batches usually carry a premium)

faqs.question: Why is Tears of Llorona valuable?
faqs.answer: It is produced in very small quantities and aged for 5 years in a unique blend of barrels, creating a profile similar to fine whiskey.

faqs.question: Do you buy single bottles?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy single bottles of Tears of Llorona.

faqs.question: Does the batch number matters?
faqs.answer: Yes, slight variations between batches interest collectors.

faqs.question: Do I need the box?
faqs.answer: While preferred, we will buy the bottle without the box.

faqs.question: Do you buy T1 Tequila?
faqs.answer: We generally do not buy German Gonzalez's T1 line, focusing specifically on Tears of Llorona.

faqs.question: How do I ship it?
faqs.answer: The bottle is stout and heavy. Use plenty of padding to prevent movement in the box.
